plot: A jazz musician somewhat awkwardly steps into the shoes of his father, a special agent for the United Nations whose disappearance has set off an international crime wave.
title: The Ferret
plot_es: A jazz musician somewhat awkwardly steps into the shoes of his father, a special agent for the United Nations whose disappearance has set off an international crime wave.
plot_en: A jazz musician somewhat awkwardly steps into the shoes of his father, a special agent for the United Nations whose disappearance has set off an international crime wave.
